# languageOptionCharacteristics

**Instance Property**

The characteristics that describe the content of the language option.

## Declaration

```swift
var languageOptionCharacteristics: [String]? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains an array of characteristics that describes the language option. See [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/language-option-characteristic-constants] for the most commonly used characteristics.

## Retrieving language option properties

- **displayName**: The display name for a language option.
- **identifier**: The unique identifier for the language option.
- **languageTag**: The abbreviated language code for the language option.
- **languageOptionType**: The type of language option.
- **MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOptionType**: The language option type to use for the Now Playing item.
